explanations.A: To work out a value for 71/99, we can think of it as 71 ÷ 99, and work this out using a bus stop where 71 is under the bus stop, and 99 is on the outside. This gives 0.717171... In fact, any whole number less than 99 in place of 71 will produce a repeated version of itself when converted to a decimal.
